scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build/css build/images build/js build/css
scripts.build-css: touch build/css/main.css && stylus < src/stylus/all.styl | cssmin > build/css/main.css
scripts.build: jade --hierarchy -o build/ src/jade/main/ && cp src/svg/*.svg build/images && cp src/js/*.js build/js && npm run build-css
scripts.docker-restart: docker stop timdouglas-nginx && docker rm -v timdouglas-nginx && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-run
